title: Is the Google Play Store app free? - Quora

response.answer_text: *No*. Absolutely no. If you think you've downloaded the app for free and your using it for free, then you've misunderstood my friend. Instead of money, your paying then your privacy and other personal data! Be cautious about yourself and your surrounding/s! Venom!
Google PlayStore is a preinstalled application that comes with every licensed Android smartphone. You do not need to install it separately. But yes, it is free

YES Google play store provides free downloading app service to users. Some versions of apps are paid versions. You paid money for the app and its services, not to the play store. Play store provides you to free app download service for all android versions.
